title: Side Effects of Teaching the Babies (with Rio Cortez)
description:
This week we talk teaching the truth to the young Black youth with Rio Cortez, NYT best selling children's book author of the ABCs of Black History.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
